name: Roomik's Cube
description:
Roomik's Cube

Roomik's cube is a classic Rubik's cube game with a small visual twist. Each face of the cube is a room floor and you have to rearrange it.

This game was originally made over the course of 72 hours for Ludum Dare 37 and the theme was "One Room".

Controls:

  • Left mouse: click on a cube and swipe on the direction in which you want to rotate the face.
  • Right mouse: click and hold to rotate the cube.
  • Mouse wheel: Zoom in/out.

The game is still under development and I am working on adding more features, starting with a timer. I'll be updating the game soon.

Please if you notice any bugs, have a suggestion or just want to let me know what you think about the game leave a comment down below I would really appreciate it.

Update:
  • Fixed the glow issue. Now the rotating face will glow.
  • Added "Quit" button to close the game.
